and (lec_name Like CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') OR name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%'))

and name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
ORDER BY l.lec_id DESC
LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}

SELECT count( l.lec_name )as total_cnt ,t.name FROM tb_lec_info l LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_userinfo t ON l.tutor_id = t.loginId
and (lec_name Like CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') OR name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%'))
and lec_name Like CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
and name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')

select ui.std_num, li.lec_name, ui.name, ( ifnull(a1.cnt,0) + ifnull(a2.cnt,0) ) as cnt, truncate(100-(( ifnull(a1.cnt,0) + ifnull(a2.cnt,0) ) / li.pre_day*100),0) as atd
from tb_lecstd_info lsi left outer join ( select ta.std_id ,( count(*) div 3 ) as cnt from tb_atd ta where (atd_state = '2' or atd_state ='3') AND lec_id=#{lec_id} group by ta.std_id ) as a1 on a1.std_id = lsi.std_id left outer join ( select std_id ,count(*) as cnt from tb_atd where atd_state = '4' AND lec_id=#{lec_id} group by std_id ) as a2 on a2.std_id = lsi.std_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_userinfo ui ON ui.loginId = lsi.std_Id left outer join ( select pre_day, lec_id, lec_name from tb_lec_info ) as li on li.lec_id = lsi.lec_id where lsi.lec_id = #{lec_id} ORDER BY ui.name LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}

SELECT l.lec_id ,l.lec_name ,l.lecrm_id ,l.tutor_id ,t.name ,le.lecrm_name ,l.max_pnum ,l.process_day ,l.pre_pnum ,DATE_FORMAT(l.c_st, '%Y.%m.%d') as c_st ,DATE_FORMAT(l.c_end, '%Y.%m.%d') as c_end FROM tb_lec_info l LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_userinfo t ON l.tutor_id = t.loginId LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_lecrm le ON l.lecrm_id = le.lecrm_id WHERE l.lec_id = #{lec_id}
